me.assembla.stringtouri.dataset
Class Dataset

java.lang.Object
  me.assembla.stringtouri.dataset.Dataset
Direct Known Subclasses:
SesameDataset
public abstract class Dataset
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract class managing a data set from any origin.

Version:
2012-07-11
Author:
Thibaud Colas
See Also:
RepositoryConnection
